content.title: Fistula First Initiative
content.definition: Arteriovenous fistula (AVF) is preferred dialysis access with best patency and lowest infection/mortality rates.
content.statement: Fistula First Initiative is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Dialysis-Access that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Fistula First Initiative helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Fistula First Initiative include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Fistula First Initiative.

clinical_pearls: Key point about Fistula First Initiative

citations.source: UpToDate. (2024). Fistula First Initiative. Wolters Kluwer.
Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
